<project
        xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/maven-v4_0_0.xsd">

    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

    <groupId>com.blackbear</groupId>
    <artifactId>flatworm-parent</artifactId>
    <version>4.0.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
    <packaging>pom</packaging>

    <name>Flatworm</name>

    <description>Flatworm is a Java library intended to allow a developer to describe the format of a flat file using an XML definition
        file, and then to be able to automatically read lines from that file, and have one or more beans be instantiated for each logical
        record (original description from James M. Turner).
    </description>

    <licenses>
        <license>
            <name>Apache License, Version 2.0</name>
            <url>http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.txt</url>
            <distribution>repo</distribution>
        </license>
    </licenses>

    <modules>
        <module>flatworm-core</module>
        <module>flatworm-examples</module>
        <module>flatworm-test-model</module>
    </modules>

    <developers>
        <developer>
            <name>James M. Turner</name>
        </developer>
        <developer>
            <name>James Lawrence</name>
        </developer>
        <developer>
            <name>Dave Derry</name>
        </developer>
        <developer>
            <name>Josh Brackett</name>
        </developer>
        <developer>
            <name>Alan Henson</name>
            <organization>Optify Software, LLC.</organization>
        </developer>

    </developers>

    <properties>
        <!-- Plugin Properties -->
        <maven.compiler.source>1.8</maven.compiler.source>
        <maven.compiler.target>1.8</maven.compiler.target>
        <maven.source.plugin.version>3.0.0</maven.source.plugin.version>
        <maven.javadoc.plugin.version>2.10.4</maven.javadoc.plugin.version>
        <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>

        <!-- Dependency Properties -->
        <commons.beanutils.version>1.9.2</commons.beanutils.version>
        <commons.collections.version>3.2.1</commons.collections.version>
        <commons.lang.version>2.6</commons.lang.version>

        <lombok.version>1.16.8</lombok.version>
        <google.guava.version>19.0</google.guava.version>

        <org.slf4j.version>1.7.21</org.slf4j.version>
        <log4j.version>2.6</log4j.version>

        <junit.version>4.12</junit.version>
        <mockito.version>2.0.54-beta</mockito.version>

    </properties>

    <dependencyManagement>
        <dependencies>

            <!-- Flatworm dependencies -->
            <dependency>
                <groupId>com.blackbear</groupId>
                <artifactId>flatworm-core</artifactId>
                <version>${project.version}</version>
            </dependency>
            <dependency>
                <groupId>com.blackbear</groupId>
                <artifactId>flatworm-examples</artifactId>
                <version>${project.version}</version>
            </dependency>
            <dependency>
                <groupId>com.blackbear</groupId>
                <artifactId>flatworm-test-model</artifactId>
                <version>${project.version}</version>
            </dependency>

            <!-- External dependencies -->
            <dependency>
                <groupId>commons-beanutils</groupId>
                <artifactId>commons-beanutils</artifactId>
                <version>${commons.beanutils.version}</version>
            </dependency>

            <dependency>
                <groupId>commons-collections</groupId>
                <artifactId>commons-collections</artifactId>
                <version>${commons.collections.version}</version>
            </dependency>

            <dependency>
                <groupId>commons-lang</groupId>
                <artifactId>commons-lang</artifactId>
                <version>${commons.lang.version}</version>
            </dependency>

            <dependency>
                <groupId>com.google.guava</groupId>
                <artifactId>guava</artifactId>
                <version>${google.guava.version}</version>
            </dependency>
            <dependency>
                <groupId>org.apache.logging.log4j</groupId>
                <artifactId>log4j-core</artifactId>
                <version>${log4j.version}</version>
            </dependency>
            <dependency>
                <groupId>org.apache.logging.log4j</groupId>
                <artifactId>log4j-api</artifactId>
                <version>${log4j.version}</version>
            </dependency>
            <dependency>
                <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId>
                <artifactId>lombok</artifactId>
                <version>${lombok.version}</version>
            </dependency>
            <dependency>
                <groupId>org.slf4j</groupId>
                <artifactId>slf4j-api</artifactId>
                <version>${org.slf4j.version}</version>
            </dependency>
            <dependency>
                <groupId>org.slf4j</groupId>
                <artifactId>slf4j-simple</artifactId>
                <version>${org.slf4j.version}</version>
            </dependency>

            <dependency>
                <groupId>junit</groupId>
                <artifactId>junit</artifactId>
                <version>${junit.version}</version>
            </dependency>
            <dependency>
                <groupId>org.mockito</groupId>
                <artifactId>mockito-core</artifactId>
                <version>${mockito.version}</version>
            </dependency>

        </dependencies>
    </dependencyManagement>

    <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.5.1</version>
                <configuration>
                    <source>${maven.compiler.source}</source>
                    <target>${maven.compiler.target}</target>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-source-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>${maven.source.plugin.version}</version>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <id>attach-sources</id>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>jar</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-javadoc-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>${maven.javadoc.plugin.version}</version>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <id>attach-javadocs</id>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>jar</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>
    </build>
</project>

# Java 8 to Java 17 Migration Summary

## Overview
This document summarizes the changes made to migrate the Flatworm project from Java 8 to Java 17.

## Date
January 29, 2026

## Changes Made

### 1. Parent POM Configuration (`pom.xml`)

#### Java Version Update
- Updated `maven.compiler.source` from `1.8` to `17`
- Updated `maven.compiler.target` from `1.8` to `17`
- Added `maven.compiler.release` property set to `17`

#### Plugin Version Updates
- `maven-compiler-plugin`: `3.5.1` → `3.11.0`
  - Changed configuration to use `<release>` instead of `<source>` and `<target>`
- `maven-source-plugin`: `3.0.0` → `3.3.0`
- `maven-javadoc-plugin`: `2.10.4` → `3.6.3`

#### Dependency Version Updates
- `commons-beanutils`: `1.9.2` → `1.9.4`
- `commons-collections`: `3.2.1` → `3.2.2`
- `lombok`: `1.16.8` → `1.18.34`
- `guava`: `19.0` → `23.0`
- `slf4j`: `1.7.21` → `2.0.16`
- `log4j`: `2.6` → `2.24.0`
- `junit`: `4.12` → `4.13.2`
- `mockito-core`: `2.0.54-beta` → `5.13.0`

#### New Dependencies Added
- `org.openjdk.nashorn:nashorn-core:15.4` - Required because Nashorn JavaScript engine was removed from JDK 15+

### 2. Module-Specific Changes

#### flatworm-core/pom.xml
- Added `org.openjdk.nashorn:nashorn-core` dependency to support JavaScript scripting functionality

### 3. Source Code Changes

#### Deprecated API Fixes
**File**: `flatworm-core/src/main/java/com/blackbear/flatworm/Util.java`
- Line 243: Replaced deprecated `new Integer(String)` constructor with `Integer.parseInt()`
  - Before: `str.substring(new Integer(args[0]), new Integer(args[1]))`
  - After: `str.substring(Integer.parseInt(args[0]), Integer.parseInt(args[1]))`

#### Mockito Package Updates
**File**: `flatworm-core/src/test/java/com/blackbear/flatworm/FileParserTest.java`
- Updated import statement for Mockito 5.x compatibility
  - Before: `import org.mockito.runners.MockitoJUnitRunner;`
  - After: `import org.mockito.junit.MockitoJUnitRunner;`

## Key Migration Considerations

### Nashorn JavaScript Engine
The most significant change in this migration was handling the removal of the Nashorn JavaScript engine from the JDK:
- Nashorn was deprecated in Java 11
- Nashorn was removed in Java 15
- Added standalone Nashorn library (`org.openjdk.nashorn:nashorn-core`) as an external dependency
- This maintains backward compatibility with existing JavaScript-based configuration

### Dependency Compatibility
All dependencies were updated to versions that are compatible with Java 17:
- Mockito 5.x supports Java 8+ and works well with Java 17
- Lombok 1.18.34 has full Java 17 support
- Log4j 2.24.0 is a modern, secure version compatible with Java 17
- SLF4J 2.0.16 is the latest major version supporting Java 17

## Build Verification

### Test Results
- All 41 tests pass successfully
- No compilation errors
- No runtime errors
- Only warnings are related to missing Javadoc comments (cosmetic)

### Build Command
```bash
mvn clean verify
```

### Build Status
✅ **BUILD SUCCESS**

## Compatibility Notes

1. The migration maintains full backward compatibility with existing code
2. All existing functionality continues to work as expected
3. JavaScript scripting support is preserved through the standalone Nashorn library
4. The codebase is now ready for modern Java features if needed in the future

## Recommendations

1. Consider migrating from JUnit 4 to JUnit 5 (Jupiter) in a future update
2. Review and add missing Javadoc comments to eliminate warnings
3. Consider using newer Java 17 features like records, pattern matching, etc. where appropriate
4. Keep dependencies up to date with regular dependency audits

## Files Modified

1. `/tmp/workdir/search_strands_20260128/flatworm/pom.xml`
2. `/tmp/workdir/search_strands_20260128/flatworm/flatworm-core/pom.xml`
3. `/tmp/workdir/search_strands_20260128/flatworm/flatworm-core/src/main/java/com/blackbear/flatworm/Util.java`
4. `/tmp/workdir/search_strands_20260128/flatworm/flatworm-core/src/test/java/com/blackbear/flatworm/FileParserTest.java`

## Conclusion

The migration from Java 8 to Java 17 has been completed successfully. The build passes all tests with `mvn clean verify` on Java 17.
